text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Padmākara, universal embodiment of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsa sum kündü guru pema jung

text.en: One in reality yet diverse in manifestation—the Eight Supreme Emanations,
text.en-trans: ngö chik dumé gar gyur tsen chok gyé

text.en: The five classes of Tötreng, wrathful and dark red in colour,
text.en-trans: tötreng dé nga drakpo marnak dang

text.en: The twelve primary and forty secondary manifestations, and the rest—
text.en-trans: namtrul chunyi trul tsen zhibchu sok

text.en: All you wondrous emanations in your hundreds of billions,
text.en-trans: ngotsar trulpa jewa trak gya dang

text.en: Together with the twenty-five disciples, So, Zur, Nub, Nyak and Nyang,
text.en-trans: jebang nyernga so zur nub nyak nyang

text.en: Chöwang, Gödem, Longchenpa, Minling Terchen,
text.en-trans: chö wang gödem longchen min ter sok

text.en: And all the other vidyādharas of the kama and terma lineages,
text.en-trans: kater rigdzin gyüpa tamché dang

text.en: As well as the wondrous ācāryas who beautifully adorned this world,
text.en-trans: dzamling dzé gyen mejung lobpön tsok

text.en: All the Kulika Dharma Kings, such as Sucandra,
text.en-trans: da zang lasok chögyal rikden tsok

text.en: The brahmin Saraha, crown ornament among a hundred siddhas,
text.en-trans: drub gyé tsukgyen dramzé sara ha

text.en: Virūpa, Ḍombi, Lūyipa, Kṛṣṇācārya, Ghaṇṭapāda,
text.en-trans: birwapa dang dombi lu nak dril

text.en: Tilopa, Nāropa, Maitripāda, and the rest,
text.en-trans: té lo na ro mai tri lasok dang

text.en: Together with Jowo Atiśa, Ngok Lekpé Sherab and Dromtönpa, as well as the Three Brothers,1
text.en-trans: jo ngok drom dang kuché nampa sum

text.en: Langri Thangpa, Sharawa Yönten Drak and all the other masters of the Kadam lineage,
text.en-trans: lang shar nyi sok kadam gyüpa dang

text.en: Drokmi Lotsāwa, Sachen Kunga Nyingpo, Sönam Tsemo,
text.en-trans: drok mi sa chen sönam tsemö zhab

text.en: Drakpa Gyaltsen, the great Sakya Paṇḍita, Chögyal Pakpa, Ngorchen, Tsarchen and Dzongpa,2
text.en-trans: drak gyal penchen chö pak ngor tsar dzong

text.en: And the all the hosts of lineage-holders of the Sakya teachings,
text.en-trans: sakyé tendzin gyüpar chepé tsok

text.en: Mañjughoṣa guru Lobzang Drakpa,
text.en-trans: jamyang lama lo zang drakpa dang

text.en: The three heart-sons and the rest—like a chain of golden mountains,
text.en-trans: tuksé nam sum lasok ser ri treng

text.en: Marpa, Mila, peerless Dakpo,
text.en-trans: marpa mi la nyammé dakpo dang

text.en: Rechungpa, Pakmodrupa, and all the learned and accomplished ones
text.en-trans: ré chung pak dru dri tak drukpa sok

text.en: Of the Drikung, Taklung, Drukpa and so on—the beautiful jewelled garland of Kagyü masters,
text.en-trans: kagyü norbü treng dzé khedrub tsok

text.en: Butön Rinchen Drup, who was like a second Omniscient One for this age of strife,
text.en-trans: tsödü künkhyen nyipa rinchen drub

text.en: Dolpo Sangye, Tāranātha Kunga Nyingpo and the rest—
text.en-trans: dolpo sangye kün ga nyingpo sok

text.en: Great beings, holders of the tantric treasures of Secret Mantra,
text.en-trans: sang ngak gyüdé ter chang kyé chen dang

text.en: And especially Khyentse Wangpo, holder of the Seven Modes of Transmission,
text.en-trans: khyepar kabab dünden khyentsé wang

text.en: Lodrö Thayé, pioneer of the Five Treasuries,
text.en-trans: dzö ngé shingta lodrö tayé zhab

text.en: Loter Wangpo, compiler of the words of Secret Mantra,
text.en-trans: sang ngak ka yi düpo lo ter wang

text.en: Lord Shenpen Thayé, who was Vairotsana in person,
text.en-trans: bai ro ngö nang zhenpen tayé jé

text.en: Orgyen Jigme Chökyi Wangpo,
text.en-trans: orgyen jikme chö kyi wangpo dang

text.en: The lion of speech, Mipham Namgyal,
text.en-trans: mawé sengé mipam nampar gyal

text.en: My most gracious teacher, the sublime protector,
text.en-trans: kadrin chewé yongdzin dampé gön

text.en: And all the deities of the maṇḍalas of the root and lineage gurus,
text.en-trans: tsa gyü lamé kyilkhor lhatsok dang

text.en: Hosts of peaceful and wrathful yidams of the four or six classes of tantra,
text.en-trans: gyüdé zhi druk yidam zhitrö tsok

text.en: Ḍākinīs and vīras of the three abodes, dharma guardians,
text.en-trans: né sum pawo khandro chökyong dang

text.en: Wealth deities, treasure keepers, and guardians of the virtuous together with your retinues,
text.en-trans: norlha terdak karchok kyong khor ché

text.en: Especially the Lord of Sages, Buddha of Medicine, Akṣobhya,
text.en-trans: khyepar tubwang men lhami trukpa

text.en: Vajrasattva, the Close Sons, Tārā,
text.en-trans: dorjé sempa nyesé drolma dang

text.en: Sixteen Elders, and the rest—
text.en-trans: neten chenpo chudruk lasokpa

text.en: All you compassionate sources of refuge, turn your wisdom minds toward me,
text.en-trans: kyabné tukjé chen nam gong su sol

text.en: Look upon me with your wisdom vision of knowledge and care.
text.en-trans: khyentsé yeshe chen gyi zik su sol

text.en: I have amassed negative, harmful actions and now experience their effects.
text.en-trans: dak gi lé ngen dik sak drebu min

text.en: I am bereft of physical and mental well-being and suffer the pains of illness.
text.en-trans: lü sem dé trok né kyi zukngü nar

text.en: In the next life, I will confront the sufferings of the lower realms.
text.en-trans: chima ngensong dukngal nyong ré ren

text.en: Having considered this unfortunate plight of mine,
text.en-trans: nyamtak dindrar gongpar dzé né kyang

text.en: Please protect me with your hands of loving kindness, I pray.
text.en-trans: jampé chak gi kyobpar dzé du sol

text.en: Let others’ misdeeds and sufferings ripen on me,
text.en-trans: zhen gyi dikduk dak la min gyur né

text.en: And let them enjoy happiness in great abundance.
text.en-trans: denam dewa püntsok tobpar shok

text.en: May all who are connected to me through merely hearing my name
text.en-trans: ming tsam töpé drelwar gyurpa nam

text.en: Discover the excellent path that leads to liberation and awakening.
text.en-trans: namdrol changchub lamzang nyepar shok

text.en: May I not suffer an untimely death but complete my lifespan.
text.en-trans: dak kyang dümin chiwé mi tsé shing

text.en: And may all my wishes and intentions be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: tsé tarchin ching samdön kün drub né

text.en: May I perfect the aspirations of Samantabhadra
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpö mönlam dzok jé shing

text.en: And not fall prey to obstacle-making demons.
text.en-trans: bardu chöpé dü kyi mitsuk shok

text.en: Directly and indirectly, may I teach with body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: go sum ngö dang gyü né tenpa dang

text.en: And provide benefit happiness for all sentient beings.
text.en-trans: semchen kün la pendé jin gyur ching

text.en: And may there be no impediment as I uphold and transmit
text.en-trans: gyalwé chö tsul drima mepa dak

text.en: The immaculate ways of the Dharma of the Victorious Ones.
text.en-trans: dzin chang pel la tokpa mepar shok

text.en: By the truth of the three most rare and precious Jewels,
text.en-trans: chok sum rinpoche yi denpa dang

text.en: And the powerful blessings and force of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsawa sum gyi tu jin nü tob kyi

text.en: May these points of aspiration be fulfilled without obstacle
text.en-trans: mönpé né di gekmé drubpa dang

text.en: And the teachings and their holders prosper and flourish!
text.en-trans: ten dang tendzin dar zhing gyepar shok
